column4: have you read some of the crazy flaws in vista? i used it for awhile (rc2) and swiched back to xp... couldn't stand it
basically they've reskinned xpmce at this point
i know, i was a supporter, then learned to hate it
it installed in my machine, but too many little quirks to use it everyday
chuck norris used windows and ubuntu was born...
you have to know a bit to get it working and hwot o use it
windows still work on far more hw without configuration
there's a billion FAQs -- check the web
different code, different license, different heritage.
oh, isn't bsd what mac os is based on?
i bet microsoft uses linux to develop windows...
they're more likely to use BSD
sorry, i meant unix, i'm still new to the difference in terminology
